Description
Citibank is one of the largest digital banks in the world, spanning over
140 countries and holds over 200,000 customer accounts. The diversity of
businesses within Citibank (Retail Bank, Cards, Mortgage, Investments etc.),
within each of these countries presents a large portfolio of customer needs to
be delivered through elegant experiences. We believe that building a
world-class banking and financial technology platform is the only way to
support Citibanks unlimited growth potential, while continuing to provide
excellent service to both internal businesses and external stakeholders. Citi is hiring a Data Scientist to join the growing digital technology team
Role Description
  • Hands on experience in predictive analytics and statistical tools, machine learning algorithms and big data tools
  • Identify, analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets using unsupervised ML approaches
  • Use statistical techniques to interpret data and analyze results
  • Manipulate, extract, process, and analyze large data sets to develop insights and surface implications
  • Create visualizations to visually represent data for consumption by different audiences

Qualifications
Required Technical Skills
  • SQL, R or Python
  • Frameworks/libs: sklearn, nltk, genism, pandas, numpy, matplotlib
  • Visualization toolsets and web app creation with popular JS frameworks (Angular, d3.js)

Desirable Technical Skills
  • Hadoop, Spark, Elastic Stack, Git
  • Familiarity with HTTP and invoking web-APIs

Personal Skills
  • Experienced in managing work with distributed teams
  • Experience working in SCRUM methodology
  • Proven sense of high accountability and self-drive to take on and see through big challenges
  • Confident, takes ownership, willingness to get the job done
  • Excellent verbal communications and cross group collaboration skills

Total Experience Required
  • 2+ years of relevant experience
  • NLP exposure beneficial
